verses.verse: A Psalm of David. Unto thee, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, will I <S%H7121>call<s%>: My <S%H6697>rock<s%>, be not thou <S%H2814>deaf<s%> unto <S%H2790>me<s%>; Lest, if thou be silent unto <S%H4911>me<s%>, I become like them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>, when I <S%H7768>cry<s%> unto <S%H5375>thee<s%>, When I lift up my <S%H3027>hands<s%> toward thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1687>oracle<s%>.

Draw me not <S%H4900>away<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, And with the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>; That <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with their <S%H7453>neighbors<s%>, But <S%H7451>mischief<s%> is in their <S%H3824>hearts<s%>.

Give <S%H5414><s%> them according to their <S%H6467>work<s%>, and according to the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings<s%>: <S%H5414>Give<s%> them after the <S%H4639>operation<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>; <S%H7725>Render<s%> to them their <S%H1576>desert<s%>.

Because they <S%H995>regard<s%> not the <S%H6468>works<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Nor the <S%H4639>operation<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>, He will <S%H2040>break<s%> them down and not build them <S%H1129>up<s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Because he hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and my <S%H4043>shield<s%>; My <S%H3820>heart<s%> hath <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H5826>him<s%>, and I am helped: Therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> greatly <S%H5937>rejoiceth<s%>; And with my <S%H7892>song<s%> will I praise <S%H3034>him<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is their <S%H5797>strength<s%>, And he is a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> of <S%H3444>salvation<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed<s%>.
Save <S%H3467><s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: Be their <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H5375>also<s%>, and bear them up for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
